subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that configure the Drawer UI component's contents, behavior and appearance.

subMembers.name: animationDuration
subMembers.description: Specifies the duration of the drawer's opening and closing animation (in milliseconds). Applies only if [animationEnabled] is **true**.

subMembers.name: animationEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to use an opening and closing animation.

subMembers.name: closeOnOutsideClick
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to close the drawer if a user clicks or taps the view area.

subMembers.name: component
subMembers.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: contentComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [contentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: contentRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [contentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: contentTemplate
subMembers.description: ##### param(contentElement): DxElement

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the view's height.

subMembers.name: maxSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the drawer's width or height (depending on the drawer's [position]) in the opened state.

subMembers.name: minSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the drawer's width or height (depending on the drawer's [position]) in the closed state.

subMembers.name: opened
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the drawer is opened.

subMembers.name: openedStateMode
subMembers.description: Specifies how the drawer interacts with the view in the opened state.

subMembers.name: position
subMembers.description: Specifies the drawer's position in relation to the view.

subMembers.name: render
subMembers.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: revealMode
subMembers.description: Specifies the drawer's reveal mode.

subMembers.name: shading
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to shade the view when the drawer is opened.

subMembers.name: template
subMembers.description: Specifies the drawer's content.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the Drawer UI component (including the view) is visible.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the view's width.

properties.name: dxDrawer
properties.description: The Drawer is a dismissible or permanently visible panel used for navigation in responsive web application layouts.

Methods.name: toggle()
Methods.description: Opens or closes the drawer, reversing the current state.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OpenedStateMode
Types.description: Specifies how the drawer interacts with the view in the opened state.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: PanelLocation
Types.description: Specifies the drawer's position in relation to the view.
